summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview with Mark Epstein, brother of Jeffrey Epstein, conducted on September 22, 2021. Mark Epstein provided information and autopsy pictures related to his brother's death while in BOP custody. The interview was conducted with his attorney present.

keyFacts: Mark Epstein, brother of Jeffrey Epstein, voluntarily met with the DOJ OIG on September 22, 2021, to provide information about his brother's death.
Mark Epstein was represented by attorney Stacey Richman during the recorded interview.
Mark Epstein provided the OIG with pictures from Jeffrey Epstein's autopsy via email on the same day as the interview.
The OIG investigation is focused on the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein while he was housed at the MCC New York in July/August 2019.
The interview transcript, emails with autopsy pictures, and a separate audio recording are part of the official OIG case file.
